title: Toyota's New Infotainment System Aims To Set A New Standard

title: New Study Says Plug-In Hybrids Are Much Dirtier Than Claimed
description: It seems that, in the real world, plug-in hybrid vehicles are not nearly as clean as they're made out to be. title: The $3,000 Rule: When to Keep Your Car and When to Trade
description: Trade-ins hit 7.6 years on average in Q1 2025, the oldest since 2019. At the same time, the average vehicle age on U.S. roads is 12.8 years. That gap says plenty: people keep cars longer, but when they do trade, they’re arriving later in the life cycle. If you’re searching “should I keep my old ...
titleSummary: "Break Even or Break Free: The $3,000 Milestone for Keeping or Trading Your Ride"
descriptionSummary: As of Q1 2025, traded-in vehicles were an average 7.6 years old, a six-year high since 2019. Meanwhile, the typical car on American roads has reached 12.8 years. This disparity reveals a trend: drivers hang onto their vehicles longer, but tend to replace them at a more advanced age.

title: The FBI Says Illegal Chinese Airbags Have Been Killing Even More Americans Than Initially Thought
